title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using the new class wizard in build 20011106, the 'Enclosing Type' field is blank when a .java file is open in the editor. This issue is observed with nested classes.
EB: The 'Enclosing Type' field should default to the current type in the editor when creating a new class for nested classes.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open a .java file in the editor. 
2. Click the new class button. 
3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' field in the new class wizard.
